mapper.select: SELECT a.*, u.u_name as author_name FROM lost_found_animals a LEFT JOIN users u ON a.user_id = u.u_id WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.*, u.u_name AS author_name, -- users 테이블에서 u_name을 가져와 author_name으로 사용 (SELECT af.file_name FROM attachment_file af WHERE af.board_id = a.id AND af.board_type = 'lostfound' ORDER BY af.id ASC LIMIT 1) AS thumbnail_file_name FROM lost_found_animals a LEFT JOIN users u ON a.user_id = u.u_id -- lost_found_animals(a)와 users(u) 테이블을 연결 ORDER BY a.id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lost_found_animals (user_id, board_type, title, content, animal_type, gender, age, location, event_date, contact_name, contact_phone, contact_email, view_count, like_count) VALUES (#{userId}, #{boardType}, #{title}, #{content}, #{animalType}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{location}, #{eventDate}, #{contactName}, #{contactPhone}, #{contactEmail}, 0, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE lost_found_animals SET view_count = view_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attachment_file (board_type, board_id, file_name, file_path, file_type) VALUES (#{boardType}, #{boardId}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileType})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM attachment_file WHERE board_type = 'lostfound' AND board_id = #{animalId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM attachment_file WHERE board_id = #{animalId} AND board_type = 'lostfound'
